text: Siglap MRT station (TE28) is a future underground Mass Rapid Transit Station on the Thomson-East Coast Line. The station is located along Marine Parade Road in Siglap, a neighborhood in the Bedok planning area, Singapore. Siglap MRT station is part of Stage 4, which has stations from Tanjong Rhu to Bayshore. The station is planned to open on 23 June 2024, with other stations on Stage 4 together. Places that are near the station are Victoria School and St. Andrew's Autism Centre. ==References== Category:Mass Rapid Transit (Singapore) stations
title: Siglap MRT station
